title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: When performing a search for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the first match is not selected. This issue occurs when double-clicking on the search result.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not automatically selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform a search for references to this field.
5. Double-click on the search result.
